H0.text: The peacock belongs to which family of birds. **Peafowl**

H1.text: The peacock belongs to which family of birds. **Turkey**

H2.text: The peacock belongs to which family of birds. **Quail**

H3.text: The peacock belongs to which family of birds. Pheasant

A4.text: Peafowl is a common name for two bird species of the genus Pavo and one species of the closely related genus Afropavo within the tribe Pavonini of the family Phasianidae (the pheasants and their allies)
